name: Auto Practice
description: Enables practice mode when entering a level.

enable-in-normal.name: Enable in Normal Mode
enable-in-normal.description: Enables practice mode when starting a level in normal mode.

enable-in-testmode.name: Enable in Test Mode
enable-in-testmode.description: Enables practice mode when starting a level in test mode.

enable-in-platformer.name: Enable in Platformer Mode
enable-in-platformer.description: Enables practice mode when starting a level in platformer mode.
